location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Printed copy of letter no.19 of 1859 from G. F. Forbes, Superintendent of the Dharwar Cotton Gin Factory, to T. Oglivy, Collector of Dharwar

mods.abstract: The letter is a half-yearly statement of the operations of the Dharwar Cotton Gin Factory for the period ending 30 November 1858, and includes: tables with the value of work done; a cotton planterâ€™s report; and an account of the receipts and expenditure of the Cotton Experiments at the Dharwar Collectorate.
